General.Name: Thien Long Group Corp
General.Description: Thien Long Group Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in stationery products in Vietnam and internationally. The company offers pen, office supplies, school supplies, and fine arts tools under Bizner, Colokit, Diem 10, TL, and FlexOffice brand name. It also offers plastic teaching aids, household plastic products, printing of trademarks, etc., and printing tampons, screen printing, tlexo printing, and embossing on products. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
